general.name: Lock Screen Message
general.description: Provides a Lock Screen message for devices
general.payloads: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd"> <plist version="1"><dict><key>PayloadUUID</key><string>03E6F56C-ABC5-48A8-8BB2-DB3EE5152D4D</string><key>PayloadType</key><string>Configuration</string><key>PayloadOrganization</key><string>Insight - USA</string><key>PayloadIdentifier</key><string>03E6F56C-ABC5-48A8-8BB2-DB3EE5152D4D</string><key>PayloadDisplayName</key><string>Lock Screen Message</string><key>PayloadDescription</key><string/><key>PayloadVersion</key><integer>1</integer><key>PayloadEnabled</key><true/><key>PayloadRemovalDisallowed</key><true/><key>PayloadScope</key><string>System</string><key>PayloadContent</key><array><dict><key>AssetTagInformation</key><string>$SERIALNUBMER</string><key>IfLostReturnToMessage</key><string>This device belongs to Organization</string><key>LockScreenFootnote</key><string>This device belongs to Organization</string><key>PayloadDisplayName</key><string>Lock Screen Message Payload</string><key>PayloadIdentifier</key><string>CFDF88E1-B94B-482C-B225-66B8CD539595</string><key>PayloadOrganization</key><string>JAMF Software</string><key>PayloadType</key><string>com.apple.shareddeviceconfiguration</string><key>PayloadUUID</key><string>CFDF88E1-B94B-482C-B225-66B8CD539595</string><key>PayloadVersion</key><integer>1</integer></dict></array></dict></plist>
